185646493.review:
Trove é um jogo que combina criatividade e aventura de forma incrível! 🌈 Com exploração, combate e personalização sem limites, sempre há algo novo para descobrir.

Cada classe traz uma experiência única, e o mundo está sempre cheio de aventuras para descobrir, dungeons para explorar, e itens incríveis para coletar. Além disso, você pode personalizar praticamente tudo, desde sua casa (as famosas "cornerstones") até seu próprio estilo de jogo! 🏡🛡️

Sim, pode ser um pouco repetitivo em alguns momentos e o grind às vezes é longo, mas o estilo descontraído e a capacidade de jogar com amigos fazem tudo valer a pena.

185527214.review: This game could be fun for longer than a day if they would actually take away the greed they built into it. Everything is a HUGE grind and a ton of road blocks just to incentivize you to open your wallet. No wonder this game is only averaging around 800 or so players (most of witch are bots sitting at spawn collecting loot pinatas and so on, or trading on the player market and keeping mid-high tier loot needed to progress on lockdown and high priced). If you play this game just hit it for a day or two and respect your self and value your time and quit and find a better game to grind. I can't recommend this game as it could bring back everyone but it would require such an overhaul to pretty much everything that it would probably break the game and I doubt they support much staff with and overhaul budget and just use it to bleed what they can from it still.

185331771.review:
怎么说呢 值得一玩的垃圾游戏

从画面上讲，我是一个喜欢玩沙盒类游戏的玩家， 画面可以打八九分，再加上洗脑轻松的音乐，实属不错的休闲类游戏。
相比泰拉利亚，MC，这里拥有更成熟的联网吧，可以说就是个纯沙盒类网游。

从1-600 PR 可以说是这个游戏最有意思的时候， 冒险与休闲并存，搜集癖玩家可以去挖挖挖什么的，但是到后来吧，就开始重复了，毕竟是网游，和WOW一样拜托不了数字膨胀的问题，随着等级的升高，只能说乐趣越来越少，同样的装备数字更大而已。

在 2000 PR 以后，可以说加装备，升宝石，大宝石，你都需要充值，俗话说充值可以变得更强。。。。在Trove也不例外，需要买宝石箱子开，要么就一直刷刷刷。总之这是一个你想冲PR就要充钱的游戏。
至于你玩到7000PR之后游戏内容大幅度减少，当你玩完儿U8，基本就没有什么新内容了，只能等跟新，而人物在15000PR以后都会很强，不管什么职业。

但是怎么说呢，休闲玩家钓钓鱼，造造自己家，刷刷副本还是推荐的，毕竟沙盒类游戏就是消遣时间的东西。 总体来说还是值得一试吧。

185143866.review: Trove is a fun and creative game with endless possibilities. The voxel-based worlds are vibrant, and the variety of classes adds a lot of replay value. Whether you enjoy building, exploring, or battling, there's something here for everyone. The community is welcoming, and the updates keep the game fresh. However, the grind can be a bit tedious at times, especially for new players. Overall, it's a great game to play casually or with friends! :))

185137976.review:
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Trove is an awesome game that’s easy to jump into and hard to stop playing. The world is full of colorful, fun areas to explore, and you can build whatever you want with the creative building tools. The gameplay mixes action, adventure, and crafting, making it fun for all types of players.

There’s always something to do, whether you’re battling monsters, gathering resources, or creating your own amazing structures. The game has tons of classes to choose from, each with unique abilities, which keeps things exciting.

The community is great, and the game is constantly updated with new content. It’s the perfect mix of fun, creativity, and adventure, and it’s a great game to play solo or with friends.

If you like sandbox games with tons of freedom, Trove is definitely worth checking out.

185066955.review: This is a fun, casual game to play.  Plenty of things to loot and build with.  I like the block size and color palette and how fast you can mine ores and lay down cubes.  Adventuring kills the feeling of grinding for me because the terrain is always different.  It's a little buggy at times but I don't blame them, hard to get servers an shit to grow on trees.  I personally feel like a heel because I have played over 1000 hours and have not been able to contribute very much in return so far.  And I am still impressed with the amount of free content at your disposal and what alot of players have done with their clubs.  But be careful of wandering all the other club worlds, I had a couple hours blink by.

184968953.review:
If you came here looking for a review, you have come to the wrong place, but if you want some very ♥♥♥♥ing good brownies, you have come to the right place. You're welcome for an actual recipe, not a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ copy and paste pie recipe. Trust me nothing goes wrong with nutella.

INGREDIENTS:

1 c. unsalted butter
2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. flour
1 c. cocoa powder
4 eggs
1 (13-oz.) jar Nutella
5 Ferrero Rocher candies, unwrapped and crumbled


DIRECTIONS:

1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2. Melt butter in a medium-sized saucepan over medium heat. Add sugar, stirring until combined. 3. Remove from heat and add salt, flour, and cocoa powder, stirring to combine. Whisk in eggs, stirring just until the mixture is combined into a batter. Set aside.
4. Spray an 8"-x-8" pan with cooking spray. Pour half of the batter into the pan. Spoon or lightly drizzle most of the Nutella on top of the batter, forming an even layer over the brownie batter. 5. 5. Use a spoon or silicone spatula to cover the Nutella with the remaining brownie batter. (If you pour the batter straight on top of the Nutella, it will sink into the Nutella and combine into one marbled—yet delicious—mess.)
6. Bake until the top layer of brownies has browned and set, 28 to 30 minutes. It shouldn’t jiggle when you remove it from the oven. (The toothpick test doesn’t work here, since the toothpick will hit the Nutella layer, making the brownies seem uncooked.)
7. Let cool for 15 to 20 minutes, then top with a drizzle of Nutella and crumbled Ferrero Rocher chocolates. Cut into squares and serve.



Credits: ★ Billy

184654943.review:
不得不说这个游戏拿来消遣很有趣，也很耗时间，一不小心就玩了几个小时。画风可爱上手简单，一开始游戏就已经是游戏中期了。
到处跳跳跳，砍砍砍，节奏很快很轻松，组队下本也完全没什么难度。虽然重复的副本和装备很快就会让玩家感到无聊，但是这款游戏的前面几十个小时确实是能给玩家带来很轻松很愉快的体验。

184634260.review: This is a fun, casual game to play.  Plenty of things to loot and build with.  I like the block size and color palette and how fast you can mine ores and lay down cubes.  Adventuring kills the feeling of grinding for me because the terrain is always different.  It's a little buggy at times but I don't blame them, hard to get servers an shit to grow on trees.  I personally feel like a heel because I have played over 1000 hours and have not been able to contribute very much in return so far.  And I am still impressed with the amount of free content at your disposal and what alot of players have done with their clubs.  But be careful of wandering all the other club worlds, I had a couple hours blink by.

184625431.review:
不得不说这个游戏拿来消遣很有趣，也很耗时间，一不小心就玩了几个小时。画风可爱上手简单，一开始游戏就已经是游戏中期了。
到处跳跳跳，砍砍砍，节奏很快很轻松，组队下本也完全没什么难度。虽然重复的副本和装备很快就会让玩家感到无聊，但是这款游戏的前面几十个小时确实是能给玩家带来很轻松很愉快的体验。

184624837.review:
My advice.... Save your time and money.

I can't emphasize this enough, yes its "free to play" but you WILL end up paying something, if not a lot of your hard earned cash. 90% of the same old bugs from beta are still there, events are recycled to the point everyone just AFK farms them and the actual content updates come around once a year. All that is left is grinding. 

Once you get to U9, where the majority of the people are, you will be plagued by rubber banding, slow chunk loading and constant disconnects. The devs really don't care, the fact they refuse to comment on it and delete or lock threads on the forum where people express their concerns, shows this. They just want new people to play, get hooked and shell out loads of cash before they realize it.

I wish I had been warned before I invested so much time/money into the game. (not through steam)

Trove is a great game at its core, its just run by a greedy, money grabbing company with absolutely no respect for its players/customers.

184621211.review:
为什么推荐它
[olist]
    [*]MMORPG，职业选择多样，像素风格简单清新
    [*]活动丰富，挑战任务小游戏趣味性强。
    [*]走在大街上竟然找不出两个衣着一样的玩家。
    [*]成就排行系统完备。
    [*]几乎所有游戏内物品都能放在玩家市场交易
    [*]可开发性强，轨道建筑挖矿钓鱼。mc党的福利
[/olist]
为了更好的体验游戏，我建议 
[olist]
    [*]有经济条件的朋友，你可能需要一个加速器，虽然裸连可以玩但是可能会时常卡顿，飘移
    [*]这款游戏很[strike]休闲[/strike]，请注意生活规律，修仙请谨慎。
    [*][spoiler]没有官中，可以下汉化包，但是游戏内英文并不生涩。一些不分青红皂白要中文的朋友请及时点否[/spoiler]
[/olist]

184333335.review:
Aunque cueste creerlo creo que El megalodón o megalodonte (Carcharocles megalodon; del gr. μέγας megas ‘grande’, raíz megal-, y ὀδούς odoús ‘diente’, raíz odont-) es una especie extinta de tiburón que vivió entre hace 19,8 y 2,6 millones de años, aproximadamente, durante el Cenozoico (de inicios del Mioceno2​ hasta el final del Plioceno).3​ Anteriormente se pensaba que era miembro de la familia Lamnidae y pariente cercano del gran tiburón blanco (Carcharodon carcharias). Sin embargo, actualmente existe un consenso casi unánime de que pertenece a la familia extinta Otodontidae, que se separó de la ascendencia del gran tiburón blanco durante el Cretácico temprano.

Si bien C. megalodon es considerado como uno de los mayores y más poderosos depredadores en la historia de los vertebrados,4​ los científicos difieren sobre si se habría parecido más a una versión más robusta del gran tiburón blanco, el tiburón peregrino (Cetorhinus maximus) o el tiburón tigre de arena (Carcharias taurus). La mayoría de las estimaciones del tamaño del megalodonte se extrapolan de los dientes; con estimaciones de longitud máxima de hasta 18 metros y estimaciones de longitud promedio de 10,5 metros. Las estimaciones sugieren que sus grandes mandíbulas podrían ejercer una fuerza de mordida de hasta 110,000 a 180,000 newtons. Los restos fósiles indican que este tiburón gigante tuvo una distribución cosmopolita, con áreas de cría en zonas costeras cálidas.5​ C. megalodon probablemente tuvo una influencia muy importante en la estructura de las comunidades marinas de su época.6​

El animal se enfrentó a la competencia de los cetáceos comedores de ballenas, como Livyatan y otros cachalotes macroraptoriales y posiblemente orcas ancestrales más pequeñas. Como el tiburón prefería las aguas más cálidas, se cree que el enfriamiento oceánico asociado con el inicio de las edades de hielo, junto con la disminución de los niveles del mar y la pérdida resultante de áreas de cría adecuadas, también pudieron contribuir a su disminución. Una reducción en la diversidad de las ballenas barbadas y un cambio en su distribución hacia las regiones polares pudo reducir la fuente primaria de alimentos del megalodonte. Un estudio de 2019 revisó evidencia más reciente que sugiere que la competencia del gran tiburón blanco moderno también pudo contribuir a la extinción del megalodonte, junto con la fragmentación del rango que resulta en una extinción gradual y asíncrona como resultado del enfriamiento de los océanos hace unos 3.6-4 millones de años, mucho antes de lo que se suponía anteriormente. La extinción del tiburón parece haber afectado a otros animales; por ejemplo, el tamaño de las ballenas barbadas aumentó significativamente después de que el tiburón desapareciese.

Literally the greatest game I have ever played, period. 
People complain about how grindy it is and how reliant the game becomes on heavy monetization... but me personally, I love grinding. I'm more than happy to get one and play for 4+ hours a day just to get a smidgen of progress. Rome wasn't built in a day.
Optionally, you should be unemployed. However in the case that you are, please consider slamming some money into this game.
